TopicTitle: I destroyed my KSP, what should I do?

Articles.Content: When I was downloading a mod for the KSP, I deleted the game data ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif). What should I do? I already reinstalled the game!(Bought on Steam)

Welcome aboard!

I feel your pain. Once when removing a mod I accidentally shift-deleted the whole GameData folder instead of just the single mod folder. Nothing to be done but to reinstall your mods (and back up your stuff in the future to make recovery easier).
[Verify the local game cache through Steam.](https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=2037-QEUH-3335) It will replace any missing or incorrect files.
If all else fails, you can use a tool like "recuva" this has saved my butt plenty of times.
